medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain localized to the right lower quadrant; associated with nausea and vomiting. Symptoms followed a colonoscopy performed 1 day prior, which was conducted to evaluate for months of diarrhea, abdominal cramping, tenesmus, and fecal urgency.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of diarrhea, abdominal cramping, tenesmus, and fecal urgency with recent colonoscopy findings of colitis.
medical_history.family_history: No inflammatory bowel disease or celiac disease.
